bag_report.Title: A mistake in the word
bag_report.Summary: An error in the spelling of the word IDEMITSU, in the name of the engine oil 1)Follow the link: https://hyperauto.ru/product/maslo-motornoe-idemitsu-zepro-eco-medalist-0w20-sinteticheskoe-sn-gf-5-dlya-benzinovogo-dvigatelya-4l-00000146, 2)Check the name of the engine oil The name of the oil is written correctly Error in the word Idemitcu, correct Idemitsu Missing
